function.name: openai_video
function.description: Create and manage video renders with OpenAI's Sora models (sora-2 / sora-2-pro). Supports create (with optional wait), get_status, download to docs/video, list, delete, remix, and auto_start (play video locally).

prompt.description: Creative description of the video to generate or the change to apply (for remix).

input_reference_path.description: Optional path under docs/images to an input reference image (jpeg/png/webp). Must match the target size.

wait.description: When true, poll until completion or timeout (max_attempts or timeout_seconds).

auto_download.description: When waiting, automatically download the final asset to docs/video (and a thumbnail to docs/images).

filename.description: Optional base filename to use when downloading. Video saved to docs/video, thumbnail/spritesheet to docs/images.

video_id.description: ID of the target video (for get_status, download, delete, remix, auto_start).

path.description: Local path to an existing video file to auto start (plays with default OS player).
